website_summaries.verdict: Colorful, sturdy, and packed with fun things to build and play with, Mia’s Camper Van will keep imaginative LEGO builders entertained long after the final brick is placed.
pros: Construct a large and tall camper featuring swivel-open doors for playing inside
Includes Mia, Stephanie, and Aria the horse
Build tent, table, and other camping accessories
cons: This large and comprehensive set is an expensive one

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set. The colors are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. The colors are amazing. You can really get a lot out of this set. My daughter, 11, enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Younger kids,will need a little help assembling.
customer_reviews.text: My nephews loved it! There were a few sections that needed a little adult help to get it assembled, but directions were easy to comprehend.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Put together for my niece. The directions are great and I enjoyed it as an adult but she is 7 and it was a little out of her league. She does love playing with the assembled toy. Legos are speedy, but it’s justified when u see the detail in the design, and all the unique special pieces that come in the set. Was very impressed and the ikea style picture instructions that came along were high quality and easy to follow. Many tiny pieces. The finished product is approx the size of a Kleenex box or smaller
customer_reviews.author: S D

customer_reviews.title: challenging enough to take time to assemble but easy enough for her to do so
customer_reviews.text: was purchased for my 8 year old niece and she adores it. challenging enough to take time to assemble but easy enough for her to do so
customer_reviews.author: michelle d.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. It was a gift for my neice. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I haven't used it or seen it in action, but I've not been told of any problems so I assume there aren't any problems with it. My neice was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old loved it! Didn't take long for her to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved it! Didn't take long for her to assemble, but this is a very cute lego set with lots of goodies to play with (i.e. pretend food, people, pets, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandaughter's 9th birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandaughter's 9th birthday. She loves it. That is enough for 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This was a hit with my Lego loving granddaughter. She is blonde and her sister, brunette...so are the Lego people in the kit! The kit has many special features and was a perfect addition to her collection. The RV is the same as ours so it will emote memories of our camping adventures together for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TireTracksUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: perhaps a pre-cursor to the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set on sale and at that price it was well worth it. Its still expensive, but it is lego and the quality is fantastic. It was a gift for my 9 year old daughter who really likes the lego friend sets. She wanted this particular set, as she wants me to buy a real camper van so we can go on holidays!
customer_reviews.author: R.D.R

customer_reviews.title: Package issue.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a present for my niece. However the box came in such poor shape that I can't give it to her. All bashed with huge oily stains all over the package. We love Lego and buy a lot of it. That never happened before. Very disappointing. Return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved this
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter loved this. It was a little challenging, but she did it herself and now plays with it with her younger brother and his Lego set. She really liked the apple tree and all the extra fun stuff. Lego's are always overpriced, but I found it on Amazon for less.
customer_reviews.author: Cacaw

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for our 9 year old niece. She really liked it! Amazon price was much cheaper than we had seen it in retail stores! A good value!
customer_reviews.author: C. Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Great Project for Inside Play
customer_reviews.text: A good long lasting Lego kit like this one is such a hit on rainy days. We had a rainy week coming up in the forecast so I bought this for my daughter ahead of time. It came before the rain did! She spent hours building this and then playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Marandino

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest Lego Friends sets. In fact, I think it is my daughter's favorite of her Friends sets. It is well thought out and has neat features. It was fun to build with typical easy to follow Lego instructions. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: LandK

customer_reviews.title: Fun Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun Lego set. The camper van opens up on the sides, and has access from the top as well. The camping theme is adorable and this set has gotten lots of play after building.
customer_reviews.author: Gala Apple

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for 7 to 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughter; she loved it. I didn’t have time or resources to find in local stores so I accepted having to pay higher price thru Amazon to get/find it.

customer_reviews.title: Love Legos!
customer_reviews.text: This set is super cute! Comes with a lot of great accessories. My daughter loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camper with amazing accessories

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends Mia’s Camper Van 41339 Building Set (488 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Size:488LEGO Friends 41339 Mia’s Camper Van makes camping with friends a dream! Lift off the roof of this cool playset for easy access to the kitchen and bathroom inside, flip open the lid of the upstairs sleeping area, put up the canopy and get to work on the tent with 2 beds inside. There’s also a picnic table, an inflatable dinghy and a friendly horse for endless outdoor adventures! Includes 2 mini-dolls and a horse figure.
feature_bullets: Build this LEGO Friends set featuring a toy camper van with opening roof, bathroom, kitchen, folding canopy, upstairs sleeping area with opening roof, a separate tent and a toy dinghy!
This big set includes Mia and Stephanie mini-doll figures, plus an Aria the horse figure for creating camp adventure and horse riding stories

Camper van toy measures over 5-inch (13cm) high, 8-inch (22cm) long and 4-inch (11cm) wide Tent measures over 1-inch (5cm) high, 2-inch (6cm) wide and 2-inch (6cm) deep Inflatable dinghy measures over 3-inch (9cm) wide, 1-inch (5cm) deep and under 1-inch (1cm) high
488 pieces – Building set for boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 12 years
LEGO Friends building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars758 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
